column4: I'm new to Linux and I'm interested in installing Ubuntu. I read that people are not happy with the latest release of Ubuntu. Which version should I install?
We cannot predict if you will like it or now.
The latest (supposedly unpopular) version is 11.04.  You can run unity (the unpopular interface) or you can run gnome 2.x (which is the old interface).
Yes.  Use the liveCD to try Ubuntu (and either interface) without installing
